actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel ANNANDALE.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for the vessel ANNANDALE for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel ANNANDALE.
